channel.title: Old Blog
channel.description: Here is my old iWeb blog, which i no longer update. Newer blog posts are on my wordpress.com blog here.

item.title: long time, no blog... website back up!
item.description: I’ve been off the blogosphere and my webpages have been down for quite a while after starting my new job in industry. My website got booted off my old employers webservers eventually, fair enough, and thanks guys for allowing my stuff there for so long. Now all my pages are back online at a new home, where I hope to update all the old info, and get my Raleigh Chopper restoration project page all filled in with all the photos and info. Meanwhile, enjoy the nice surfer lady photo above.

item.title: lots of snow then...
item.description: ok... thats enough snow for now. Went snowboarding at Holzhau today, had all the fun! Driving was a bit exciting as the roads were far from clear. Hooray for traction control and anti lock brakes!

item.title: 2nd snow... and lots of it!
item.description: ...and the skis and snowboard are getting waxed, so no action this weekend. But soon... yes... soon!

item.title: Perfect Franglais from Luxembourg
item.description:
It’s hard to read... so from the Hotel Am Klouschter room card:
“By respect for nature, reuse the linen of the toilet several times. Alone the linen of toilet deposited in the shower will be given in washing.”

Reverse google translated back into French gives:
“Par respect pour la nature, la réutilisation du linge de la toilette à plusieurs reprises. Seul le linge de toilette déposé dans la douche sera donnée à laver.”

By some modern miracle, this is only slightly different from the French text on the card... suggesting google translate was used for the english translation. Thats just cheating!
Well, it amused me for a couple of minutes.
